Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +4 on untrained skill checks
Acrobat Dedication: Critical success on Tumble Through to traverse a foe's space makes the space normal terrain
Assurance (Acrobatics): Can take an automatic 21 on Acrobatics checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Contortionist: Successful Escape using Acrobatics inflicts off-guard vs. next self attack before the end of the next turn/Can Squeeze at full speed
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Graceful Leaper: Can use Acrobatics instead of Athletics for Jumps
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze 5' per rd, or 10' per rd on a critical success
Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 23 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Bola (+10 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Lance (+12 1d8+3 P [Crit +d8]; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+12 1d6+3 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Swords): Attack Master (Simple Swords; Martial Swords)/Attack Expert (Advanced Swords)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Pick): Weapon Familiarity (Pick)
Brutish Shove: (1) Two-handed melee Strike inflicts off-guard until the end of the turn; success also allows an automatic Shove
Dodge Away: (R) Gains +1 Armor Class vs. the triggering melee attack and can Step 10' if the attack misses
Double Shot: (2) Makes 2 ranged Strikes against different foes at the current multiple attack penalty -2
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Lightning Swap: (1) Stows held objects and draws 2 weapons or a shield and a weapon
Lunge: (1) Makes a melee Strike with +5' range
Parting Shot: (2) Steps away from a foe and makes a ranged Strike with the target off-guard
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Tumbling Opportunist: (F) Attempts to use Acrobatics to Trip a foe after moving through its space once per min
Tumbling Strike: (1) Successful Acrobatics vs. Reflex allows moving through a foe's space without triggering reactions to make a melee Strike against it; critical success inflicts off-guard against the Strike, failure allows the Strike but not the move, and critical failure negates both
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 3 available vs. 12 allocated
Dodge Away Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and acrobat dedication feature (currently 1)
Graceful Leaper Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 7, acrobat dedication feature (currently 1) and acrobatics rank (currently 3) >= 3
Tumbling Opportunist Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 10 and acrobat dedication feature (currently 1)
Tumbling Strike Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and acrobat dedication feature (currently 1)
